text: I have a staged page that is redirecting to a live page. I canâ€™t figure out where to turn off the redirect. It is not in the site settings. <http://gflesch-2259185-hs-sites-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/|gflesch-2259185-hs-sites-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/>
Wrong link. This is the one that is redirecting. <http://www-gflesch-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/>

Go to Settings > Domains and URLs > URL Redirects
If you see an entry for <http://www-gflesch-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com> redirecting to <https://www.gflesch.com>
try to delete it

Hey everyone, is there a "magic URL"  available to create a new TICKET like the one you have to create deals or contacts? `<https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/2774399/deals/list/view/all/?createNewObject=DEAL>`
I tried `<https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/2774399/tickets/list/view/all/?createNewObject=TICKET>` but it doesnt seem to work...
